name: Smoke & Feather
description:
A multiplayer arena battler

Defend your clan from neighboring ninjas as you weave in and out of smoke and shadow, hurling  shurikens and stabbing with kunai from the dark

CONTROLS:

  • Left trigger: toss smoke bomb
  • Left shoulder: drop smoke bomb
  • Right trigger: shuriken volley
  • Right shoulder: Kunai stab
  • Use left stick to move, and right stick to aim!

NOTES

  • Shurikens and kunais can deflect each other, listen for the loud clang!
  • Both attacks deal 1 damage, but deal 2 if attacking from shadow or smoke!
  • Smoke bombs work on a recharge system
    • You have 3 to start, and 3 max
    • Smoke bombs will regenerate over time
    • (unfortunately nothing in game to indicate this yet, just trust the smoke!)
  • On the game over screen, the winning player can press one of the main buttons to restart the game (typically X/A/B depending on controller type)
